page.title: 16THE YOUNG FARMERS CLUB
page.content: Young Farmers is a club. Sometimes you will get people comming to a meeting to tell you about flower arranging, calving etc. We also have parties and run concerts as well as going carol singing at Christmas. There are competitions for the older members of the clubs.There is the Junior Field day which is the same but for the younger members. There are people in charge of the club who have to be voted for by the other members. There is a chairperson, a secretary and a vice-chairperson who organise most of the activities.
